statements: SELECT * FROM loan_default_rates;
SELECT loan_id, loan_term, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_default_rates WHERE default_rate < 3.5;
SELECT loan_id, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE loan_term = 12;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE loan_term BETWEEN 6 AND 24;
SELECT * FROM loan_default_rates WHERE default_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY loan_id DESC, loan_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_default_rates WHERE loan_id = 100 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND loan_term <= 36;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE loan_term > 12 ORDER BY customer_id, default_rate ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loan_default_rates GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_defaults_data;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_defaults_data WHERE default_rate > 0.05;
SELECT loan_date, loan_amount FROM loan_defaults_data ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_score_data WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, risk_category FROM credit_score_data WHERE risk_category = 'High Risk';
SELECT * FROM loan_defaults_data ORDER BY loan_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loan_defaults_data WHERE default_rate > 0.05;
SELECT loan_amount, default_rate FROM loan_defaults_data WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND default_rate < 0.1;
SELECT credit_score, risk_category FROM credit_score_data WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score ASC;

SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, loan_date, default_rate, credit_score, risk_category FROM loan_defaults_data JOIN credit_score_data ON loan_defaults_data.customer_id = credit_score_data.customer_id ORDER BY loan_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM loan_defaults;
SELECT customer_id, loan_date FROM loan_defaults ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customer_details WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_defaults WHERE default_rate > 0.05;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customer_details WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customer_details
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE credit_score >= 700
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT loan_amount, loan_date FROM loan_defaults WHERE default_rate < 0.05
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(loan_id) AS total_loans FROM loan_history GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM loan_default_rates;
SELECT borrower_name, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates ORDER BY default_rate DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE default_rate > 0.1;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_default_rates WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT borrower_details.name, borrower_details.address, loan_payments.payment_amount FROM borrower_details INNER JOIN loan_payments ON borrower_details.borrower_id = loan_payments.loan_id;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_default_rates ORDER BY loan_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM borrower_details WHERE occupation='Engineer'
SELECT name, address FROM borrower_details WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT loan_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM loan_payments WHERE payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT borrower_name, score FROM loan_default_rates JOIN credit_score ON loan_default_rates.loan_id = credit_score.borrower_id
SELECT * FROM loan_default_rates;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE default_rate > 3.50;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer_details ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount < 10000;
SELECT repayment_id, loan_id, amount_paid, payment_date FROM repayments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, default_rate FROM loan_default_rates WHERE default_rate > 2.5;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_details WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY age;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT application_id, amount_paid, payment_date FROM repayments WHERE amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
